manifest.ext.name: 数字提取器-LE
manifest.ext.description: 轻松从JSON、YAML、CSV、TOML、INI和.ENV文件中提取数字
manifest.command.extract.title: 提取数字
manifest.command.dedupe.title: 去除重复数字
manifest.command.sort.title: 排序数字
manifest.command.settings.title: 打开设置
manifest.command.settings.export.title: 导出设置
manifest.command.help.title: 帮助与故障排除
manifest.settings.title: 数字提取器-LE设置
manifest.settings.copy.clipboard.desc: 自动将提取结果复制到剪贴板
manifest.settings.csv.streaming.desc: 逐步将CSV提取转移至编辑器
manifest.settings.dedupe.desc: 启用提取数字的自动去重
manifest.settings.open.new-file.desc: 在新编辑器中打开处理内容
manifest.settings.open.side-by-side.desc: 在新侧边编辑器中打开提取结果
manifest.settings.safety.enabled.desc: 启用大文件及操作的安全检查
当输入文件大小超过此字节阈值时发出警告
manifest.settings.safety.warn.large-outp: 当结果行数超过此阈值时，在打开/复制前发出警告
manifest.settings.safety.warn.many-docum: 当结果文档数量超过此阈值时，在打开多个文档前发出警告
manifest.settings.parse-errors.desc: 解析失败时以 VS Code 通知形式显示解析错误
manifest.settings.sort.enabled.desc: 启用提取数字的自动排序
manifest.settings.sort.mode.desc: 启用排序时选择结果排序方式
manifest.settings.statusbar.enabled.desc: 显示 Numbers-LE 状态栏以实现快速访问
manifest.settings.telemetry.desc: 在输出窗格启用本地遥测日志
manifest.settings.analysis.enabled.desc: 启用提取数字的自动分析
manifest.settings.analysis.stats.desc: 在结果中启用统计分析
manifest.settings.performance.max-durati: 操作最大允许时长（毫秒）
manifest.settings.performance.min-throug: 最低所需吞吐量（数字/秒）
manifest.capability.untrusted-workspaces: 不受信任工作区功能受限
runtime.help.title: Numbers-LE Help
runtime.help.quick-start:
1. Open a JSON, YAML, CSV, TOML, INI, or .ENV file
2. Run "Numbers-LE: Extract Numbers"
3. View extracted numbers in results
runtime.help.commands:
**Extract Numbers**: Extract from current document
**Sort Numbers**: Sort numerically or by magnitude
**Deduplicate Numbers**: Remove duplicate numbers
**Toggle CSV Streaming**: Enable for large CSV files
**Settings**: Configure options
runtime.help.formats:
**Supported**: JSON, YAML, CSV, TOML, INI, .ENV
**Number Types**: Integers, floats, percentages, scientific notation
**CSV Features**: Column selection, streaming for large files
runtime.help.troubleshooting:
**No numbers found?** Check file format and number syntax
**Performance issues?** Enable CSV streaming for large files
**Need help?** Check Output panel for details
runtime.help.settings:
Access via Command Palette: "Numbers-LE: Open Settings"
Key settings: Copy to clipboard, CSV streaming, deduplication, sorting, analysis
